001package com.github.sormuras.bach.project;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.ModuleDescriptorSupport;
004import java.lang.module.ModuleDescriptor;
005import java.nio.file.Files;
006import java.nio.file.Path;
007import java.util.Optional;
008import java.util.function.UnaryOperator;
009
010/** A module declaration with its possibly targeted folders. */
011public record DeclaredModule(
012    ModuleDescriptor descriptor, Path info, Optional<String> mainClass, Folders folders)
013    implements Comparable<DeclaredModule> {
014
015  @FunctionalInterface
016  public interface Operator extends UnaryOperator<DeclaredModule> {}
017
018  public record Tweak(ProjectSpace space, DeclaredModule module, Operator operator) {}
019
020  public String name() {
021    return descriptor.name();
022  }
023
024  public static DeclaredModule of(Path pathOfModuleInfoJavaOrItsParentDirectory) {
025    return DeclaredModule.of(pathOfModuleInfoJavaOrItsParentDirectory, 0, FolderType.SOURCES);
026  }
027
028  public static DeclaredModule of(
029      Path pathOfModuleInfoJavaOrItsParentDirectory, int version, FolderType... types) {
030    var path = pathOfModuleInfoJavaOrItsParentDirectory.normalize();
031    if (Files.notExists(path)) throw new IllegalArgumentException("Path must exist: " + path);
032    var info = Files.isDirectory(path) ? path.resolve("module-info.java") : path;
033    if (Files.notExists(info)) throw new IllegalArgumentException("No module-info in: " + path);
034    var descriptor = ModuleDescriptorSupport.parse(info);
035    var folders = Folders.of(new Folder(info.getParent(), version, FolderTypes.of(types)));
036    return new DeclaredModule(descriptor, info, Optional.empty(), folders);
037  }
038
039  @Override
040  public int compareTo(DeclaredModule other) {
041    return name().compareTo(other.name());
042  }
043
044  DeclaredModule tweak(Tweak tweak) {
045    return this == tweak.module ? tweak.operator.apply(this) : this;
046  }
047
048  public DeclaredModule withMainClass(String name) {
049    return new DeclaredModule(descriptor, info, Optional.ofNullable(name), folders);
050  }
051
052  public DeclaredModule withSourcesFolder(String directory) {
053    return withSourcesFolder(directory, 0);
054  }
055
056  public DeclaredModule withSourcesFolder(String directory, int release) {
057    return withFolder(Path.of(directory), release, FolderType.SOURCES);
058  }
059
060  public DeclaredModule withResourcesFolder(String directory) {
061    return withResourcesFolder(directory, 0);
062  }
063
064  public DeclaredModule withResourcesFolder(String directory, int release) {
065    return withFolder(Path.of(directory), release, FolderType.RESOURCES);
066  }
067
068  public DeclaredModule withFolder(Path directory, int release, FolderType... types) {
069    var folder = new Folder(directory.normalize(), release, FolderTypes.of(types));
070    return new DeclaredModule(descriptor, info, mainClass, folders.add(folder));
071  }
072}
